Title: Superman
Overview: Mild-mannered Clark Kent works as a reporter at the Daily Planet alongside his crush, Lois Lane. Clark must summon his superhero alter-ego when the nefarious Lex Luthor launches a plan to take over the world.
Tagline: You'll believe a man can fly.
Keywords: saving the world, journalist, dc comics, crime fighter, nuclear missile, galaxy, superhero, based on comic book, criminal, sabotage, north pole, midwest, kryptonite, super powers, superhuman strength, aftercreditsstinger, save the day
production_companies: Warner Bros., Dovemead Films, Film Export A.G.
Cast: Christopher Reeve, Marlon Brando, Margot Kidder
